column4: Blarg. Anyone around? Just ran into an irritating problem with my hardware.
Basically, I got a Nvidia FX 5500, it's an old card and well, seemed promising. I think I installed it wrong or something. Anyway, maybe some can give me a proper guide? It'd be deeply appreciated.
how did you download the nvidia driver?
the restricted driver program thingy will take care of installing drivers for you though
